entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
